summary: This is an email from December 7, 2018, noting that various lawmakers are calling on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender suggests touching base to discuss the matter, referencing a news article about the situation.

events.title: Lawmakers call for DOJ probe into Epstein NPA
events.description: Various lawmakers are demanding an investigation and explanation from the Department of Justice regarding the Non-Prosecution Agreement given to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email is dated December 7, 2018, and discusses political pressure on the DOJ regarding the Epstein case.
Lawmakers are publicly calling for an investigation into the 'sweetheart deal' or Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein.
The email references a specific NBC News article covering the lawmakers' demands.
The correspondence indicates internal communication about managing the political fallout and media scrutiny of the Epstein NPA.
